DataElement.preferredName: Malignant Neoplasm Metastatic Colorectal Involvement Diagnosis Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The specified free-text field related to the location of a tumor relating to the colon and rectum, or to the entire large bowel, composed of atypical neoplastic, often pleomorphic cells that invades other tissues and extends from its original site of growth to another anatomic site.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The location of a tumor relating to the colon and rectum, or to the entire large bowel, composed of atypical neoplastic, often pleomorphic cells that invades other tissues and extends from its original site of growth to another anatomic site.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A tumor composed of atypical neoplastic, often pleomorphic cells that invade other tissues.  Malignant neoplasms usually metastasize to distant anatomic sites and may recur after excision.  The most common malignant neoplasms are carcinomas (adenocarcinomas or squamous cell carcinomas), Hodgkin's and non-Hodgkin's lymphomas, leukemias, melanomas, and sarcomas. -- 2004

Concepts.definition: A neoplasm composed of atypical neoplastic, often pleomorphic cells that invade other tissues. Malignant neoplasms often metastasize to distant anatomic sites and may recur after excision. The most common malignant neoplasms are carcinomas, Hodgkin and non-Hodgkin lymphomas, leukemias, melanomas, and sarcomas.

Property.preferredDefinition: A term referring to the clinical or pathologic observation of a tumor extension from its original site of growth to another anatomic site.:Relating to the colon and rectum, or to the entire large bowel.:To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process.

Concepts.definition: A term referring to the clinical or pathologic observation of a tumor extension from its original site of growth to another anatomic site.
Relating to the colon and rectum, or to the entire large bowel.
To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the specified free-text field related to an aspect of patient/participant's diagnosis

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).
